TopicTitle: I need help with making a city with kerbal konstruct

Articles.Content:
i am currently making a city for kerbal konstruct a concept that many have tried, failed or succeeded on, the problem is that most people get caught up in real life, but i am a student with loads of free time to work on stuff like this.

the problem is i don't know how to get what i have made into ksp, i know there is modeling then unity and last coding but i don't know how to perform the last two steps.

 

and help designing or even modeling or texturing buildings would be great.

 

thanks
